name: spaze/phpstan-disallowed-calls
description: PHPStan rules to detect disallowed method & function calls, constant, namespace & superglobal usages

scripts.lint-7.x: vendor/bin/parallel-lint --colors src/ tests/ --exclude tests/src/TypesEverywhere.php --exclude tests/src/AttributesEverywhere.php --exclude tests/src/disallowed/functionCallsNamedParams.php --exclude tests/src/disallowed-allow/functionCallsNamedParams.php --exclude tests/src/disallowed/attributeUsages.php --exclude tests/src/disallowed-allow/attributeUsages.php --exclude tests/src/disallowed/constantDynamicUsages.php --exclude tests/src/disallowed-allow/constantDynamicUsages.php --exclude tests/src/Enums.php --exclude tests/src/disallowed/controlStructures.php --exclude tests/src/disallowed-allow/controlStructures.php
scripts.lint-8.0: vendor/bin/parallel-lint --colors src/ tests/ --exclude tests/src/TypesEverywhere.php --exclude tests/src/AttributesEverywhere.php --exclude tests/src/disallowed/constantDynamicUsages.php --exclude tests/src/disallowed-allow/constantDynamicUsages.php --exclude tests/src/Enums.php
